name: Volcanic Eruptoid
text: If this card is sent from the hand to the GY: You can destroy 1 card your opponent controls and inflict 1000 damage to your opponents LP. You can send 1 "Blaze Accelerator" from your hand or Deck to your GY; Special Summon 1 "Volcanic" monster from your Deck, ignoring its summoning conditions. You can only activate this effect of "Volcanic Eruptoid" once per turn.
